text: Jisasɨ 5.6 Jo 1.29-34, 14.17, 16.13, 19.34, 1 Ti 3.16, 1 Jo 1.7 Kɨlaisɨ fɨli neŋ veci avɨli hɨvɨ nudɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahami uami. Avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahɨci cɨhu kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨlihua lamalama agadɨ hɨvɨ lama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifavɨci uci nudɨ mɨdɨ agaŋ mɨgɨci hɨmami uami. Asɨ dɨ Amɨŋ agaŋ nɨbu ciaŋ amɨŋ abalamalama hɨsɨŋ hɨdɨlɨ uami. Nɨbu ala Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ saŋ haiabɨla iahaiaha abɨlalɨ uami.
